casebody.data:
No. 09-1007. Mountain America, LLC, et al., Petitioners v. Donna Huffman, Assessor of Monroe County, West Virginia, et al. 559 U.S. 1102, 130 S. Ct. 2377,

176 L. Ed. 2d 785,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3565. April 26, 2010.

Motion of West Virginia Manufacturers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia denied.

Same case below, 224 W. Va. 669, 687 S.E.2d 768.
